personalInfo.name: ADHAM AL MECHKOR
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.about: I am Adham Almechkor, a passionate Full Stack Developer currently pursuing a degree in Digital Development. At 23 years old, I am driven by a desire to innovate and create solutions that enhance the digital landscape. My journey in digital development has equipped me with a solid foundation in programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and React.

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: I worked with three-person teams to create an e-commerce website from scratch for a class project.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Our project aimed to develop a comprehensive library management system that streamlined cataloging, lending, and tracking of resources to enhance accessibility and efficiency for both librarians and patrons.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developing a comprehensive website portfolio to showcase my projects, services, and capabilities.

projects.name: Estima-Dashboard
projects.description: Estima-Dashboard is a responsive web application built with Next.js and styled using Tailwind CSS. It provides real-time insights and data visualization, allowing users to easily monitor essential metrics. With its sleek design and intuitive interface, Estima-Dashboard enhances productivity for personal and professional use.

projects.name: Cv-Template
projects.description: Cv-Template is a sleek and modern resume builder designed to help job seekers create professional CVs effortlessly. Utilizing Next.js for dynamic rendering and Tailwind CSS for customizable, responsive designs, this project allows users to craft visually appealing resumes that stand out. It's perfect for anyone looking to build a standout CV quickly and efficiently.

experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.description: As part of my Final Year Project (PFE) as a Full Stack Developer, I worked on a range of projects, including e-commerce platforms, library management systems, and portfolio websites.
